CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS assets (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, category_id INTEGER NOT NULL, name TEXT NOT NULL, value DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, quantity DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, acquisition_date DATE NOT NULL, created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY(category_id) REFERENCES categories(id), FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id))
INSERT: INSERT INTO assets (user_id, category_id, name, value, quantity, acquisition_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE: UPDATE assets SET category_id = ?, name = ?, value = ?, quantity = ?, acquisition_date = ? WHERE id = ? AND user_id = ?
DELETE: DELETE FROM assets WHERE id = ? AND user_id = ?
